title: Konami logo
content:
I was wondering what font was used for the Konami logo. I know for a fact that it's a serif-type font. As far as which one it is, I'm not sure. Can anyone help me?   
   
 ![Konami Logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20120305231120im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32297.jpg)
author: ecosvaldo

comments.content:
This question came up a couple of months ago and was never answered. Even my friend who does contract work for the company was unable to get an answer to the question, unfortunately.   
   
 [Here's the link to the previous discussion.](http://web.archive.org/web/20120305231120/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23838.html)
